title: How to Catch Deoxys in Pok√©mon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire

steps.title: Fly into space with Rayquaza.
steps.content: Fly into space with Rayquaza. You will encounter a huge asteroid, and Rayquaza will undergo Mega Evolution to smash it open. Once the asteroid is smashed, Deoxys appears.

steps.title: Catch Deoxys.
steps.content: Catch Deoxys. Refer to the tips section for more info on Deoxys.

steps.title: Go to Mossdeep Space Center just in case you accidentally knocked out Deoxys.
steps.content: Go to Mossdeep Space Center just in case you accidentally knocked out Deoxys.

steps.title: Go to the control room upstairs.
steps.content: Go to the control room upstairs.

steps.title: Listen to the scientists talk about Deoxys being spotted on Route 131.
steps.content: Listen to the scientists talk about Deoxys being spotted on Route 131.

steps.title: Return to Sky Pillar, and you'll see Deoxys again.
steps.content: Return to Sky Pillar, and you'll see Deoxys again.
